title: AMC Enters Talks With Bondholders, Sparking Slump in Debt Prices
description: A group of AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. bondholders is kicking off confidential talks with the theater chain, prompting some of its notes to tumble amid concerns a broader debt move may be afoot.
content: A group of AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. bondholders is kicking off confidential talks with the theater chain, prompting some of its notes to tumble amid concerns a broader debt move may be afoot.
